solution_line_template: When three times the number of dolphins in the ocean joins in from a river, the number of dolphins in the ocean increases by {multiplier} *{initial_dolphins} = <<{multiplier}*{initial_dolphins}={dolphins_from_river}>>{dolphins_from_river}
The total number of dolphins in the ocean increases to {dolphins_from_river}+{initial_dolphins} = <<{dolphins_from_river}+{initial_dolphins}={total_dolphins}>>{total_dolphins}
